attributes.action: 'not make us pay for the London Mosque.  The people of this country do not mind people of any religion having somewhere to pray, as long as we do not have to pay for it.'
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This is not about religion, as some people would like to argue, this is about British tax payers being saved the additional burden of paying for any new religious meeting place.  Other religions fund their buildings from their followers donations and the system has worked well so far.  Why should an exception be made now and why should we have to pay for it too?  It is unfair and divisive.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
